short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically block YouTube ads. Block all ads, or only the ones which annoy you. See which companies are targeting you and why.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block YouTube ads and analyze your personal statistics: what ads was blocked, why it was offered to you, which ads were offered most often.
